title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API and model library.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, generate, pull, push, list and delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, embeddings and custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompts and utilities.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# / .NET client for Ollama.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repository for building RAG apps with Ollama and Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with Ollama models in servers.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama with streaming replies.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing Ollama with OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: SwiftUI Mac app that wraps Ollama for native UI interactions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing an async client for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models; chat, embeddings, tool-calling and structured output.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Interactive CLI chat tool built on ollama-js with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-chat (PyPI)
summary: Lightweight PyPI package exposing a single chat() helper with retry, timeout and streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, embeddings and strongly-typed options.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands and threads.
